Headline: #151 SheridanTemporary Reroute at Inner Lake Shore Drive/Division.
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses are rerouted via Michigan, Chicago, LaSalle, North Ave, Stockton Dr & over normal route due to fire department activity nr Inner LSD/Division

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, Chicago, LaSalle, North Avenue, Stockton Drive, then resume their normal route. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to fire department activity near Inner Lake Shore Drive/Division.
